```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

# Read in data

```{r}
fp = here::here("data/FY20-historical-reservations-full.csv")

RIDB_cleaning_post2019(full_file_path = fp, 
                       state = "California", 
                       df_name = "RIDB_CA_2020")
```

# Save clean data 

```{r}
write_csv(RIDB_CA_2020, here("data/clean/RIDB_CA_2020.csv"))
```

# Metadata

```{r}
summary(RIDB_CA_2020)
```


```{r}
unique(RIDB_CA_2020$parentlocation)
```

459 unique `park` values in CA but only 44 unique `parentlocationid` and 44 unique `parentlocation` so these id's and locations repeat for `park` sites?
